meanings.definition: The beliefs or practices of nondenominationalisms.
meanings.sent1: Many people appreciate the simplicity of nondenominationalisms.
meanings.sent2: The community center promotes nondenominationalisms for all faiths.
meanings.sent3: At the potluck, the variety of nondenominationalisms in desserts was impressive.
meanings.sent4: In a world of diverse beliefs, nondenominationalisms can be a unifying force.
meanings.sent5: The art exhibit showcased the beauty of nondenominationalisms through different perspectives.

meanings.sent1: Unity and acceptance are key aspects of nondenominationalisms.
meanings.sent2: The town embraces the peaceful coexistence that comes with nondenominationalisms.
meanings.sent3: The picnic had a relaxed vibe, reflecting the spirit of nondenominationalisms.
meanings.sent4: In a world full of divisions, nondenominationalisms offers a sense of harmony.
meanings.sent5: The garden symbolized the beauty of nondenominationalisms in its diverse flowers.
